00041     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042     PagingLandScapeTexture* PagingLandScapeTexture_SplattingShader::newTexture()
00043     {
00044         return new PagingLandScapeTexture_SplattingShader(mParent);
00045     }
00046     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     bool PagingLandScapeTexture_SplattingShader::isMaterialSupported()
00048     {      
00049                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00050             
00051                 if (opt->NumMatHeightSplat < 3)
00052                         return false;
00053         if (opt->numTextureUnits < 4)
00054             return false;  
00055         if (!opt->hasFragmentShader)
00056             return false;
00057             
00058         return true;
00059     }
